sense.def:
Kdor je
unsteady
, težko stoji na nogah ali hodi.

seg.quote: She seemed unsteady on her feet.
He rose unsteadily to his feet.

sense.def:
Roke so
unsteady
, kadar jih težko obvladujemo.

seg.quote: Stephen poured two brandies with an unsteady hand.

sense.def:
Kadar so predmeti
unsteady
, jih ne držimo trdno ali niso trdno pritrjeni ali postavljeni.

seg.quote: She was balancing three boxes in an unsteady pile.
